Class DisplayableViewer

Object
DisplayableViewer
public class DisplayableViewer extends Object
Utility class for rendering objects that implement the Displayable interface and print.

  • Method Details

    • displaySingle

      public static <T extends Displayable> void displaySingle(T displayable)
      Displays a single Displayable with borders
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object that extends Displayable
      Parameters:
      displayable - the Displayable object to be displayed;

    • displaySingle

      public static <T extends Displayable> void displaySingle(T displayable, UserController userController)
      Displays a single Displayable object along with its top and bottom borders. If null, a default message is printed.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object that extends Displayable
      Parameters:
      displayable - the Displayable object to be displayed;
      userController - the UserController instance used to determine additional information to display, based on the type of controller.

    • displayList

      public static <T extends Displayable> void displayList(List<T> displayableList, String message)
      Displays a list of Displayable objects with borders. If null, a specified message will be printed instead.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of objects that extends Displayable
      Parameters:
      displayableList - the list of Displayable objects to be displayed
      message - the message to be displayed if the list is empty

    • displayList

      public static <T extends Displayable> void displayList(List<T> displayableList)
      Displays a list of Displayable objects using the DisplayableViewer. If null, a default message "Nothing is found" shown.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of objects that extend Displayable
      Parameters:
      displayableList - the list of Displayable objects to be displayed

    • displayList

      public static <T extends Displayable> void displayList(List<T> displayableList, String message, UserController userController)
      Displays a list of Displayable objects with borders. if null a specified message is shown. Based on the type of UserController and Displayable, extra information shown
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the objects that extend Displayable
      Parameters:
      displayableList - the list of Displayable objects to be displayed
      message - the message to be displayed if null
      userController - the UserController instance used to provide necessary context for displaying additional related information

    • displayList

      public static <T extends Displayable> void displayList(List<T> displayableList, UserController userController)
      Displays a list of Displayable objects using the DisplayableViewer. If the list is empty, a default message "Nothing is found" shown.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of objects that extend Displayable
      Parameters:
      displayableList - the list of Displayable objects to be displayed
      userController - the UserController instance used show extra info
